title: VR-Based Classroom Management Simulation: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Provision of a training environment specialized for science curriculum-centered classroom scenarios

learning_goals: Applying effective strategies to resolve at least 3 types of classroom conflict scenarios (e.g., student disputes, disruptive behaviors) in VR simulation environments.
Improving classroom management execution skills by over 20% based on peer feedback after simulation.
Practicing student engagement techniques in over 5 virtual classes using the ENGAGEVR platform while maintaining confidence levels at 3.5/5 points or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
